name: Allpurposecardgame
tagline: Great python script design for most card games.
body:
### Welcome to AllPurposeCardGame.
Most card game python scripts are designed for just one type of game like poker or bridge.  This one is designed to be general purpose and portable for most games.

If you use this for anything please tweet at jonrighthere
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
